entries.content: Starting new session with Moti. Reviewed recent work - we've been working on Codex CLI integration and fixing Claude missing events. Multiple files modified in streaming, permission, and Codex service layers. Ready to continue where we left off.

Starting minimal tool UI redesign. Goal: Show only essential info (filename for Read, command description for Bash, etc.) with clickable expansion to reveal full paths and actions like "Open in VS Code".

Completed minimal tool UI implementation: CSS is now ultra-compact (28px height), ToolFormatter returns { minimal, full } format, tooltips show full details on hover. Next: implement click handlers for "Open in VS Code" action.

Completed minimal tool UI redesign! All components updated: CSS (28px height compact cards), ToolFormatter (minimal/full display), ToolClickHandler (click actions), UIEventHandlers (VS Code file opening). Tools now show filename only with full path on hover, clickable to open in editor.

Successfully completed minimal tool UI redesign. Moti is happy with the implementation. Tools are now 50% smaller (28px), show minimal info (filenames only), with full details on hover and click-to-open-in-VS-Code functionality.
